name: #AlienAbduction
description:
Shady Reporter Natsumi Aki wants to have records of the hottest Hugamee Bay, Florida has to offer! Peculiar Alien Edelweiss wants to rescue her boyfriend from an invasion on the planet she grew to love! Former Broadway Starlet and Mercenary May Gantz just wants to relax! Join these girls in the science fiction picture show as they rescue a whole bunch of their friends from giant enemy crabs, insectoid alien guards, and another slew of surprises~!

This game was made for the "Touch The Stars" Game Jam.
